column4: hey anyone know if it's available on Mac if I can get the driver for Ubuntu?
drivers? what drivers? for mac???
I want to get this camera it's supported by Mac & Windows wanted to see if there was drivers for Linux
don't get your hopes up to much though.. mac and linux isn't exactly the same
Xorg.0.log is the newest one.. the others are older
thanks. okay I'm confused as to why I'm in there. all I asked was if there was a tutorial I could follow to install the envyng and incase that jacks up go back to the one I have now.
hmm.. don't know of a tutorial to go back.. but you could always see what the bot says to !nvidia
and installing envyng is just "sudo apt-get install envyng-gtk"
envyng itself is a point a click application
so it's just "sudo apt-get install envyng envyng-gtk"
yes
will it automatically blacklist the driver I'm using now?
I think it will uninstall your current driver and install a new one
php6th I don't know what you were talking about no point click.. lol.
did you run envyng?
the GTK
yes
yeah.. got it working.. forgot to update.
thanks lol.
php6th, MikeSeth thanks installing envyng worked.
nice
fixed a lot of issues actually.. Now to configure it and stuff I can still use the nvidia-settings right?
you can still use nvidia-settings, yes
